title: Premiere: Troy – Cover Me
body:
For an independent artist, currently still releasing music via his own means, **Troy** is already a resounding success.

With an EP from last year clocking up well over a million plays in total on Spotify, as well as having over 100k monthly listeners, his soulful brand of hearts-on-sleeves anthems are clearly striking a chord. His latest offering, _Cover Me_, has the sort of classic rock songwriting tinge to it that Ben Howard’s second album nailed – coming across as emotionally raw yet achingly addictive. This just cries out for repeated listens. Check out Cover Me below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
